name: Heavy Armor
desc: Increase your enemies' HP by 30%

name: Adrenaline
desc: Increase your enemies' Attack by 30%

name: Barrier
desc: Increase your enemies' Crit Resist by 30%(Crit Resist can lower the rate to take a Crit hit)

name: Poisonous Gas
desc: Reduce the Heal effect your Girls receive by 60%

name: Energy Drain
desc: Your Girls won't be able to trigger their Active skills in the first 3 rounds of the Battle

name: Close Formation
desc: The damage you deal will distribute evenly among all enemies.

name: Medical Supply
desc: Your enemies will regenerate 15% of their Maximum HP at the end of each round

name: Scapegoat
desc: Each enemy will transfer 2 random debuffs they have to a random Girl in your team at the end of each round. (Control effect will be transferred first, the Girls who with fewer debuffs will be transferred first)

name: Ultimate Seal
desc: Each enemy will gain 2 shields that can neutralize 1 damage the first time she takes a lethal damage, and randomly Seal an ally Girl (All their passive skills that can be triggered will not be available) for 2 rounds.

name: Void Seal
desc: At the beginning of the battle, random 3 of your Girls will be sealed (All their passive skills that can be triggered will not be available) for 2 rounds. This effect will be triggered once every 2 rounds.

name: Armor Plate
desc: The enemy will only take 10% of their Maximum HP damage at most from each hit

name: Blind
desc: At the beginning of each round, 2 random ally Girls will be Blinded (Blinded Girls' Active skill will target 1 random enemy only, the effect lasts for 1 round).

name: Bleed out
desc: All your Girls take a (12% of their Maximum HP) damage at the end of each round

name: Buffer
desc: Your enemies will take 90% less damage at the beginning of the battle. This effect will be reduced by 10% at the end of each round for 4 rounds.

name: Thorns
desc: The enemies reflect 100% of Basic Attack and Active skill damage they take to the attackers

name: Full Attack
desc: At the beginning of battle, all enemies have 200 Energy. During the first 2 rounds of battle, all enemies recover 100 Energy at the end of each round. Starting from the 3rd round, all enemies recover 50 Energy at the end of each round.

name: Well Protected
desc: You enemies will be immune to all debuffs at the 1st round, they will also be immune to damage in the first 2 rounds.

name: Tiredness
desc: Reduces your Warriors' Block rate by 20%, your Mages' and Rangers' Precision by 20%, your Assassins' Armor Break by 25%, your Priestesses' Heal amount by 15%

name: Disinfectant Spray
desc: All your enemies will randomly remove 3 debuffs from themselves at the end of each round

name: Regroup
desc: The first 2 enemies who takes lethal damage will heal themselves by 100% of their Maximum HP

name: Energy Potion
desc: Heal 1 random enemy in front-line for 8% of Maximum HP and increase Attack of 1 random enemy in back-line by 20% for 2 rounds at the end of each round.

name: Stun
desc: In the odd rounds, Stuns 1 random Girl in the front-line of your team for 1 round, in the even rounds, Stuns 1 random ally in the backline of your team for 1 round.

name: Infestation Pandemic
desc: In odd the rounds, the damage dealt by your Girls in odd positions is reduced by 15%, in the even rounds, the healing effect received by your Girls in even positions is reduced by 30%.

name: Victor Rush
desc: At the start of battle, the damage the girl with the lowest HP in your team received increases by 20% for 3 rounds. Your enemies will target this girl when picking their target.

name: Faint
desc: Lower the Attack of the Girls in your team by 10%

name: Back Waters
desc: Your enemies will take 20% less damage after they have less than 50% HP.

name: Painless
desc: Reduces damage taken by enemies by 70%, at end of turn they will receive additional damage equal to 25% of previous damage reduced for 4 turns. (Cannot be transferred or purified)

name: Poor Health
desc: Lower the HP of the Girls in your team by 15%

name: Low Morale
desc: Your Girl's Crit Attributes will be lowered to 0.

name: Revenge
desc: When an enemy is defeated, all enemies remaining will heal themselves for (20% of self maximum HP), and increase their Attack, Precision, Block Rate and Crit by 20% for 3 rounds.

name: Invisibility
desc: Each enemy will gain Invisibility (they will be able to dodge attacks that target 1 enemy or target random enemy, lower the damage taken by 50% and gain 100% extra Crit) for 2 rounds when their HP is lower than 50% (can trigger only once)

name: Exile
desc: Banish the Girl with the highest HP in your team from battle. (The Girl banished won't be able to move, targeted or receive buffs and debuffs, if she's the only Girl left in your team, you will lose the battle.)

name: Healing Curse
desc: All your Girls gain 3 stacks of Healing Curse at the beginning of battle. Each Stack of Healing Curse removed without being triggered will deal 10% of maximum HP to the target.

name: Insufficient Energy
desc: Reduce the energy your Girls get by 50%. If your Girls have no Energy, they won't be able to deal damage. If your Girls have Energy more than 50, they will only deal 80% of damage. If your Girls have Energy lower than 20, their Energy will be removed at the end of each round.
